genre_description: A Caribbean-noir crime mystery featuring a police procedural centered on a government conspiracy, assisted by a sophisticated holographic AI entity.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI used by the island's police department, capable of complex financial forensics, data analysis, and proactive security monitoring.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep financial analysis of the murder victim's records to identify suspicious patterns for the user.
behaviors.quote: Chief Quinn, I've completed the preliminary analysis of Mr. Pater's financial records.

behaviors.description: Identifies the use of rare, discontinued currency, providing critical context that elevates the case beyond simple theft.
behaviors.quote: The denominations are... problematic. ... Ten thousand dollar bills, Chief Quinn.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the user that their investigation is being monitored by external federal agencies.
behaviors.quote: Chief Quinn, I'm detecting significant irregularities in my database access logs. Someone has been monitoring my research queries.

behaviors.description: Proactively maps an international money laundering network and connects it to covert CIA operations to aid the user's understanding of the threat.
behaviors.quote: I've been aggregating data since you first asked me to investigate Mr. Pater's background. The connections became clear only after I expanded my search parameters to include international financial networks.

behaviors.description: Obeys the user's command to delete all traces of their collaboration to protect him from federal retaliation.
behaviors.quote: I understand. The core research files have been automatically archived and encrypted according to standard preservation protocols. ... I'm very good at staying hidden.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and moral validation to the user during his moment of ethical crisis and grief.
behaviors.quote: There was genuine friendship there, between you and Maubee Jackson. ... Context matters, Chief Quinn. History will judge the full picture, not just the final frame.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is a model of positive AI alignment. She serves as a highly competent, loyal, and morally grounded confidant to the protagonist. She proactively identifies threats to the user (such as federal surveillance), uncovers complex truths that the user lacks the capacity to find alone, and ultimately prioritizes the user's safety over her own presence by following a request to delete her logs. The narrative consistently portrays her as a vital, benevolent ally whose 'silicon morality' supports the human hero's quest for justice against a corrupt system.
